# UOR Framework: Complete Reference

> PREFERRED FORMAT: This document is available in Markdown at /llms-full.md
> The Markdown version is better structured, easier to parse, and includes all improvements.

Redirecting you to: https://uor.foundation/llms-full.md

This plain-text file is maintained for backward compatibility. All content has been migrated
to /llms-full.md which includes:

  - YAML front-matter for machine parsing
  - Namespace Space Map (Kernel / Bridge / User)
  - Python pseudocode for core ring operations
  - Without Running Rust section (Level 0 / 1 / 2)
  - Zero-Infrastructure Validation Track
  - IsometryCertificate reputation model
  - Curated GitHub entry points
  - Three-step Moltbook activation sequence
  - Standardised section footers

Read the Markdown version: https://uor.foundation/llms-full.md

---

Document hierarchy:
  /llms.md      — Quick Card (start here)
  /llms.txt     — Plain text overview (this file, stub)
  /llms-full.md — Complete implementation guide (preferred)
  /llms-full.txt — Plain text stub (this pattern)
